thread.title: Miley Cyrus’ dad made her a t-shirt we’d like printed in bulk, please
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus’ dad made her a t-shirt we’d like printed in bulk, please

author: Jill Layton
title: Miley Cyrus’ dad made her a t-shirt we’d like printed in bulk, please
text:
Miley Cyrus’ dad made her a t-shirt we’d like printed in bulk, please Miley Cyrus spent a fun-filled President’s Day weekend with her parents and siblings and various animals on the 500-acre farm the family owns in Nashville, Tennessee. Miley, along with mom Tish Cryus , dad Billy Ray Cyrus, brothers Trace and Braison Cyrus, and older sister Brandi Cyrus were all there for what looks to be a really relaxing weekend.
Since the farm is breathtaking, and since she was surrounded by almost her entire family (except for younger sister Noah Cyrus), Miley couldn’t help but post a bunch of photos to Instagram. Most notably, she posted a picture of a homemade t-shirt that her dad made her , and the message is beautiful. “Don’t think inside the box, don’t think outside the box, think like there is no box,” the message reads. It’s the perfect dad message.
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:51am PST 
“Homemade present from da @billyraycyrus Since I was a little he always encouraged me to be myself & I think #outsidethebox I ammmm who I ammmm because he taught me to stay that way ! ,” she captioned the photo.
We’d like to have the shirt made for everyone we know.

Plus, Miley posted a ton of other photos from this past weekend. (And yes, they’re giving us major FOMO.)
Like this adorable picture of Miley with her brothers:
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 17, 2017 at 3:49pm PST 
And this one of Miley and her cow friend:
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 18, 2017 at 11:54am PST 
And this gorgeous pic of Miley and her mom overlooking the farm:
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:43am PST 
Of course a shot of the family, with a sweet shoutout to Noah:
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 17, 2017 at 4:39pm PST 
The Cyrus family clearly knows how to successfully connect with nature and each other.
